Bash(/c/wamp64-v3/bin/php/php8.2.26/php.exe /c/wamp64/www/maestro/symfony-app/bin/console doctrine:query:sql "UPDATE maestro.cadrage_proposals cp SET project_id = (SELECT a.project_id FROM maestro.analyses a WHERE a.id = cp.analysis_id), status = ''ACCEPTED'', applied_at = cp.created_at WHERE project_id IS NULL")

Bash(/c/wamp64-v3/bin/php/php8.2.26/php.exe /c/wamp64/www/maestro/symfony-app/bin/console doctrine:query:sql "UPDATE maestro.projects p SET project_cadrage = subq.cadrage_data, project_cadrage_updated_at = subq.latest_created FROM (SELECT cp.project_id, jsonb_build_object(''perimetre'', cp.perimetre, ''contraintes'', cp.contraintes, ''architecture'', cp.architecture, ''swot'', cp.swot, ''estimation'', cp.estimation) AS cadrage_data, MAX(cp.created_at) AS latest_created FROM maestro.cadrage_proposals cp GROUP BY cp.project_id, cp.perimetre, cp.contraintes, cp.architecture, cp.swot, cp.estimation) subq WHERE p.id = subq.project_id AND p.project_cadrage IS NULL")
